channel.title: Payment components on MultiSafepay Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Payment components on MultiSafepay Docs

item.title: Customizing payment components
item.description: After integrating the payment component, the default user interface (UI) styling is applied. You can customize the styling to match your brand’s visual identity, including fonts, colors, and layout. Customizing the UI To edit the default styling of the component: Select each CSS class you want to edit. Add the relevant CSS properties and set the values. CSS class selectors CSS class selectors CSS class What it does .

item.title: Payment component integration manuals
